alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Southern Liberty; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:59AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Trinity, eastern Montgomery, San Jacinto, northern Chambers, Liberty, Polk, southeastern Walker and northeastern Harris Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 258 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Groveton to 6 miles west of Seven Oaks to Goodrich to near Plum Grove to Memorial Park. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baytown, southeastern Conroe, Humble, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Liberty, Cleveland, Dayton, Livingston, Hunters Creek Village, Piney Point Village, Beach City, Cloverleaf, Kingwood, Spring Branch North, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Greater Heights, Barrett and Memorial Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Southern Liberty; Trinity; Walker
